Welcome to Gspread2’s documentation!¶

Gspread¶

gspread2.load_workbook(url, credentials)¶

Load a Google Sheet workbook.

Parameters

  • url – Google Sheet URL (key will be supported in future release)

  • credentials – Service Account JSON credentials created for the Google Sheet. Can be path, dict or JSON str.

Returns

gspread2.core.Workbook

Gspread Core¶

class gspread2.core.Cell(worksheet, row, column, value)¶

Cell within a worksheet.

Enhanced replacement for gspread’s Cell class.

row¶

Cell Row number

column¶

Cell Column number

value¶

Cell Value. Updating this will instantly reflect on the Google Sheet

property col¶

Implemented for gspread compatibility

property coordinates¶

A1

Type

Cell position in worksheet in format

refresh()¶

Refresh value from worksheet.

Returns

Cell instance

class gspread2.core.Worksheet(gspread_worksheet)¶

Worksheet class that wraps around gspread’s Worksheet class.

All original functions and attributes are still available.

property id¶

Worksheet ID

property name¶

Worksheet Title
